MakeYourOwn.title:
Launch your own
Artificial Intelligence Call Center
MakeYourOwn.description: Automate your call center with custom AI agents.

desc1.title: Create an AI agent
desc1.description: Build, train, and deploy AI agents to automate tasks,research, and collaborate in real-time. Equip themwith your favorite tools and dynamic knowledge fortimeless productivity.

desc2.title: Automate your call center
desc2.description: Boost productivity with our Custom AI Agents. Experience the future as you build, train, and deploy your AI workforce. Accomplish tasks at 10x speed, powered by our AI chatbot, project assistant, workflow generator, and more.

desc3.title: Generate Any Project
desc3.description: Spark creativity with a task or objective. Generatedynamic to-do lists, flow charts, project sprints,SOPs, and more. Visualize your work in multipledimensionsâ€”lists, boards, tables, calendars, mindmaps, and more. Streamline with AI and bring yourvision to life.

arg1.title: 1.Operator Dependent:
arg1.description: Traditional call centers depend on human operators, requiring a large number of employees to serve customers.

arg2.title: 2.Time limit:
arg2.description: Often works only during business hours, which limits customer service time.

arg3.title: 3.Errors:
arg3.description: Human operators may make mistakes or lose patience, causing inconvenience to customers.

arg4.title: 4.Expensive expenses:
arg4.description: Expenses will be high due to the need for human resources.

arg1.title: 1.Automated Approach:
arg1.description: The "Suhbatchi" is automated with the help of artificial intelligence answers customers' questions and meets their needs.

arg2.title: 2.24/7 Service:
arg2.description: An "Suhbatchi" provides round-the-clock service, which allows customers to Allows you to apply in time

arg3.title: 3.Quick and efficient responses:
arg3.description: The Suhbatchi's responds to customer questions using AI technology provides fast and accurate responses, which increases customer satisfaction.

arg4.title: 4.Low Costs:
arg4.description: Automated systems reduce the need for human resources, which significantly reduces costs.

GridBox.title: Automate your call center with the Suhbatchi

24_7_xizmat.title: 24/7 Service
24_7_xizmat.description: We manage rapid and efficient inquiries through an automated system with artificial intelligence.

tezkor_muloqot.title: Quick Communication
tezkor_muloqot.description: We respond to any of your questions promptly. Fast and efficient communication with customers using artificial intelligence.

ideal_xizmat.title: Ideal Service
ideal_xizmat.description: We offer services and solutions tailored to customers' needs. We provide high-quality service to every customer.

oylik_hisobotlar.title: Monthly Reports
oylik_hisobotlar.description: We provide comprehensive monthly and annual reports to analyze customer inquiries and service quality.

til_qollab_quvatlash.title: Language Support
til_qollab_quvatlash.description: The Suhbatchi communicates in Uzbek. In the future, we plan to expand our services to Russian and English languages.

avto_qongiroqlar.title: Auto Calls
avto_qongiroqlar.description: Schedule automatic calls with customers. You can connect with your customers at any time you want.
